SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Groups.Transforms
Class MatrixTransform

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Node
      SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Group
          SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Groups.Transforms.TransformGroup
              SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Groups.Transforms.MatrixTransform
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGL_Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrientationTransform
public class MatrixTransform
extends TransformGroup

Instances of this class are Group nodes that transform their children using multiplication by a specified 4x4 matrix. In particular, this class will call glMultMatrix to multiply the ModelView matrix stack by the specified 4x4 matrix.

apply_to

public void apply_to(Vector3D in_vec,
                     Vector3D out_vec)
Multiply the specified Vector3D object by this matrix transform. This method allows an application to track the current position of an object.

Specified by:
apply_to in class TransformGroup
Parameters:
in_vec - The vector that the transform is applied to.
out_vec - The value of this vector is set to the result of applying the transform to in_vec.
